Movies.Title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
Movies.Description: A classic coming of age tale about heartbreak and healing, with a Dracula Musical

Movies.Title: Free Guy
Movies.Description: An NPC in a video game becomes aware of his existance and starts a revolution in the gaming world.

Movies.Title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
Movies.Description: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

Movies.Title: Interstellar
Movies.Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Movies.Title: Spider-Man 2
Movies.Description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.
